snippet: World number one Serena Williams retired from her Hopman Cup match against Australian Jarmila Wolfe on Tuesday with a knee injury barely two weeks before launching her bid for a seventh Australian Open title....
lead_paragraph: World number one Serena Williams retired from her Hopman Cup match against Australian Jarmila Wolfe on Tuesday with a knee injury barely two weeks before launching her bid for a seventh Australian Open title.

headline.print_headline: Serena Retires From Hopman Cup Match With Knee Injury
headline.main: Serena Retires From Hopman Cup Match With Knee Injury
